predicate.note: Frames file for 'nickname' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: assign a nickname

example.name: passive
example.text: While Mr. Roderick was reared in the shadows of Pittsburgh's smoking mills, Mr. Corry grew up in Cincinnati, a city nicknamed *trace* ``Porkapolis'' and more accustomed to pork chops than pig iron.

example.name: active seems a little odd
example.text: Mary nicknamed John Squishy-squishy Nowaka Eblis O'Shaunessy.

roleset.note: The fact that the active seems awkward (at best) might indicate that "nicknamed" is a predicative adjective, not a passivized verb.
